programme.desc: Captain Hastings and the Belgian supersleuth investigate a baffling gangland murder which draws them both into the underworld of London's Little Italy. Miss Lemon turns out to have a link with the victim's valet. Whodunit, starring David Suchet and Hugh Fraser

programme.title: Chitty Chitty Bang Bang (1968)
programme.desc: Eccentric inventor Caractacus Potts rescues an old car from the scrapheap, only to discover it has magical, gravity-defying powers. Meanwhile, Baron Bomburst, the blundering ruler of Vulgaria, will do anything to get his greedy hands on it. Children's musical adventure, based on the book by Ian Fleming, starring Dick Van Dyke, Lionel Jeffries, Sally Ann Howes, Gert Frobe, Benny Hill and James Robertson Justice

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Barnaby becomes an unwelcome guest at baron Ned Fitzroy's wedding to Beth Porteous when the maid of honour is found pinned to the wall with a dagger. Meanwhile, Cully gets cold feet about tying the knot with Simon and is disappointed to learn the honeymoon to New Zealand will have to be cut short. With his own daughter's nuptials to attend, Barnaby races to unearth the family secrets he is sure lie behind the Fitzroy tragedy. Detective drama, starring John Nettles and Laura Howard

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: The owner of local country magazine Midsomer Life becomes a suspect when a man's body is discovered in woodland, and it is established the victim had been having an affair with his wife. As Barnaby and Jones delve into the case, another murder forces them to reassess their inquiries. Detective drama, starring John Nettles, Jason Hughes and Simon Williams

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: A magician's assistant drops dead on stage, poisoned by the toxins from a tropical frog. While Barnaby and Jones begin their investigations, tempers flare in the local community between Ernest, a firm believer in a mystical cult, and his former friend Aloysius - whose background in the jungles of South America makes him the prime suspect for the murder. Starring John Nettles, Ronald Pickup and Stuart Wilson

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When director Nick Cheyney is found beheaded by a guillotine on the set of his latest film, Barnaby and Jones are left with no shortage of suspects. The victim, it transpires, was on poor terms with several people in some way connected to the project, including the mother of his child, and an actor who blamed him for ruining his career. Guest starring Nicky Henson

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: A prestigious golf club is the setting for murder when a player is bludgeoned to death on the 13th hole. Barnaby and Jones discover gambling, illegal money-lending and assault are rife among the snobbish members, who are also dismissive of the local villagers and only allow them on the course for a few hours a week. Before long, another body turns up, making the detectives doubly determined to catch this terror of the fairways. John Nettles and Jason Hughes star, with guest appearances by Nicholas Le Prevost, John Standing and real-life golfer Sam Torrance

programme.title: Kate & Koji
programme.desc: When she and Medium are set to be rewarded for their work during the pandemic, Kate discovers Councillor Bone is going to present the award and refuses to collect it. Medium is hugely disappointed, but Kate eventually relents and it is the councillor whose nose is put out of joint. Return of the comedy, starring Brenda Blethyn and Okorie Chukwu

programme.title: Kate & Koji
programme.desc: This time, Kate lets Koji run the cafe, which he does all too well. Meanwhile, Medium wants feedback on the novel he has written. Comedy, starring Brenda Blethyn, Okorie Chukwu and Blake Harrison

programme.title: Never the Twain
programme.desc: Simon helps his old pal Oliver when he falls foul of his prospective mother-in-law

programme.title: Never the Twain
programme.desc: Criminals hold Simon, Oliver, Mrs Sadler and Banks at gunpoint, forcing some interesting characteristics to come to light

programme.title: Scott & Bailey
programme.desc: Rachel meets Sean's son, who turns out to be an eight-year-old version of his dad, and the idea of becoming a stepmum puts her further off the idea of marriage than she was before - not that she even agreed in the first place. Andy asks Janet out for a drink, but when she turns him down he accuses her of leading him on. A woman in a sexy cop's uniform turns up dead, and the DCI assumes the killer was her lover - the question is, which one of her many lovers was it? And to add to the mystery, why was her face painted green?

programme.title: Unwind with ITV
programme.desc: Daily escape designed to calm the mind and encourage relaxation and reflection

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Buying goods from the comfort of home

programme.title: Never the Twain
programme.desc: The duo's antagonism comes to the surface when they are asked to re-enact an ancient battle. Comedy, starring Donald Sinden and Windsor Davies

programme.title: A Touch of Frost
programme.desc: Dour DI Jack Frost suspects a man he arrested years before for a series of bizarre assaults on children could have returned to the area and recommenced his unsavoury activities. He tracks down the culprit, who swears he has turned over a new leaf, and decides not to charge him - a decision that shocks fellow sleuth DS Maud, whose misgivings are later justified in tragic fashion. Starring David Jason, Peter Gunn, Susannah Doyle, Bruce Alexander, John Lyons and Gwyneth Powell

programme.title: Doc Martin
programme.desc: The doctor spends his last day in Portwenn seeing an influx of patients as he prepares to close down the surgery and move to London. As he bids farewell to old friends and sets off to leave the village, he sees Louisa's teaching assistant Tasha fall from the Harbour Day stage and stops to help. But the bigger hold-up comes when pregnant Louisa is involved in a car accident. Martin Clunes and Caroline Catz star

programme.title: Doc Martin
programme.desc: The curmudgeonly GP struggles to come to terms with his new role as a father, having planned to resume his career as a consultant in London before the arrival of his and Louisa's as-yet unnamed son. To make matters worse, he begins to have serious doubts about the competency of his replacement Dr Di Dibbs when she misdiagnoses a patient as well as herself. Martin is then dealt a devastating personal blow after hearing his aunt Joan has died. Starring Martin Clunes, Joanna Scanlan and Caroline Catz

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: On doctor's orders, the dapper Belgian sleuth visits Brighton for what he hopes will be a relaxing holiday, but it leads to one of the most absorbing cases he has ever faced - the disappearance of a cache of jewels. Mystery, starring David Suchet, with Hermione Norris, Philip Jackson and Sorcha Cusack

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: Secrets could be exposed as Rosamund arrives at Downton following Edith's shock departure. Rose is delighted to introduce Atticus and his parents to the Abbey, while Anna and Bates start thinking about a fresh start, now that the worst of their problems are seemingly behind them. Molesley is concerned to see Daisy becoming disillusioned with her studies, and Isobel makes a happy announcement, but there may be trouble on the horizon. Violet has her hands full with her warring servants, while Mary and Blake seize an opportunity to send Gillingham a strong message

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: Preparations are under way for Rose's wedding, but family tensions on both sides threaten to derail proceedings. Edith's arrangement with Marigold is happily working out, but how long can she and Cora conceal the truth from Robert? Denker reveals an unexpected side to her personality, which causes trouble for more than one of the servants. With the war memorial due to be unveiled, Mrs Patmore is still upset, but Robert has something up his sleeve. Branson comes to a heart-wrenching decision, and the storm clouds that have been gathering over Anna and Bates finally burst

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: It's the early autumn of 1924 and Rose's father-in-law Lord Sinderby has rented Brancaster Castle in Northumberland and invited the Crawleys to a grouse-shooting party. However, the Sinderbys' butler Stowell (guest star Alun Armstrong, New Tricks) has an axe to grind and a scandalous secret threatens to derail the holiday. Back at Downton, the servants hold the fort and unlikely later-life romances abound, while Bates takes drastic measures to clear Anna's name as she faces an uncertain future behind bars. The seasons change and another Christmas is enjoyed at the Abbey, where a heartbreaking farewell and a joyful reunion take place. Feature-length festive special, starring Hugh Bonneville, Maggie Smith, James Faulkner, Penny Downie, Joanne Froggatt and Brendan Coyle

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: Mary's past catches up with her when an unwelcome visitor delivers an ultimatum, as secrets and rifts threaten the unity of the family. News about the running of Downton Hospital puts Violet on the warpath, while those below stairs find social changes are putting their futures in jeopardy and Daisy's good intentions at the Mallerton House auction have disastrous consequences. Final series of the costume drama, starring Maggie Smith, Hugh Bonneville and Michelle Dockery

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: Plans for the wedding are gathering steam, but Lady Mary's meddling lands Carson in trouble with Mrs Hughes. Cora and Violet clash over plans for the hospital takeover, and Thomas's job search is proving disheartening. Mary comes up with a fresh idea that offers Anna new hope, prompting a trip to London, and Lady Edith faces challenges at the magazine although it's a problem closer to home that reaches breaking point. A day out for the family and servants ends in panic and leaves Robert facing a difficult decision

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: A guest at a village Halloween party boasts of having witnessed a murder years previously - and later meets a grisly end in keeping with the macabre spirit of the occasion. Arriving to investigate, Poirot delves back into the annals of local life - and uncovers a series of mysterious deaths, any one of which could have a bearing on the present case. David Suchet, Amelia Bullmore and Zoe Wanamaker star

programme.title: An Audience with Jimmy Tarbuck
programme.desc: The Liverpudlian comic performs before a host of showbiz celebrities including Cilla Black, Bruce Forsyth, Billy Connolly, Michael Parkinson, Harry Secombe and Henry Cooper. Jimmy will be fielding questions from the audience, and the event concludes with a special jam session featuring Hank Marvin, Rick Wakeman, Kenny Jones, Justin Hayward and John Lodge

programme.title: Karen Pirie
programme.desc: With the suspects under attack, Karen's case has become a live investigation overnight, but is this someone out for revenge, or is Rosie's killer trying to silence the truth? Thrown together with DS Phil Parhatka at the most awkward time, Karen and her team try to overcome the judgement of her superiors and find the culprit in time. Crime drama, starring Lauren Lyle

programme.title: Ladies of Letters
programme.desc: Irene and Vera have a disastrous reunion at a funeral after a long breakdown in their friendship. Comedy, starring Maureen Lipman and Anne Reid, based on the books and radio series by Carole Hayman and Lou Wakefield

programme.title: Ladies of Letters
programme.desc: Vera begins associating with some decidedly unsavoury new acquaintances, and sends one of them to settle a score with Irene - who responds by deciding it would be prudent to go and visit her daughter in Australia. Comedy, starring Maureen Lipman and Anne Reid

programme.title: Upstairs, Downstairs
programme.desc: Sarah falls for the manservant of Capt Ryttsen, a dashing Swedish army officer who is staying in the Bellamy household as a guest of James, but later finds herself suspected of betraying her employers' trust by stealing from them. Vintage drama, starring Pauline Collins and Simon Williams

programme.title: Scott & Bailey
programme.desc: A gangland killing takes a surprising twist when it turns out the victim has been sexually mutilated. Andy punishes Janet by keeping her out of the heart of the investigation, and when she rebels, the ensuing row becomes personal. Rachel feels ambushed by Sean, who announces his mother wants to meet her - especially as she has spent years trying not to think about her own mum. Suranne Jones, Lesley Sharp, Sean Maguire and Nicholas Gleaves star

programme.title: A Touch of Frost
programme.desc: Dour DI Jack Frost suspects a man he arrested years before for a series of bizarre assaults on children could have returned to the area and recommenced his unsavoury activities. He tracks down the culprit, who swears he has turned over a new leaf, and decides not to charge him - a decision that shocks fellow sleuth DS Maud, whose misgivings are later justified in tragic fashion. Starring David Jason, Peter Gunn, Susannah Doyle, Bruce Alexander, John Lyons and Gwyneth Powell

programme.title: Never the Twain
programme.desc: Oliver is delighted when Simon's ex-wife takes him under her wing, but her former husband is terrified she intends to stay for good. Comedy, with Donald Sinden and Windsor Davies

programme.title: Sport Filler Shows (2020)
programme.desc: Ed Chamberlin introduces some of the great racehorses of the modern era, including Nijinsky, Tiger Roll, Best Mate, Desert Orchid and Shergar

programme.title: The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: A valuable gem is stolen from the Countess of Morcar, leading the famous detective into a bizarre investigation involving a recovered Christmas goose. Mystery, starring Jeremy Brett, David Burke and Ken Campbell

programme.title: Magnum, PI
programme.desc: Thomas is instructed to pay a ransom demand without pursuing the case further, but a series of 'accidents' makes him decide to break the rules and hunt down the would-be blackmailer. Detective drama, guest starring Ted Danson (Cheers)

programme.title: The Professionals
programme.desc: Bodie's former girlfriend visits from East Germany and he finds himself framed for carrying out an assassination attempt - leaving Doyle with no choice but to bring him in for questioning. Drama, starring Lewis Collins and Martin Shaw

programme.title: Minder
programme.desc: Arthur and Terry rescue Greek-Cypriot Charlie from a beating and learn that his cousin is being threatened by another relative who wants to take over their restaurant. Encouraged by Charlie who is vowing revenge, Terry takes a job in the establishment to try to catch the tormentors red-handed

programme.title: The Champions
programme.desc: The crusading heroes investigate a murder, which leads them to uncover ageing Nazis who are being held in a disused mine. Starring William Gaunt and Alexandra Bastedo

programme.title: The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: A governess takes up a new position, but feels constrained to consult Holmes about some of the bizarre conditions stipulated by her employer. Period crime drama, guest starring Natasha Richardson, Joss Ackland and Patience Collier, with Jeremy Brett and David Burke

programme.title: ITV Racing Live
programme.desc: Ed Chamberlin presents coverage of a trio of group races from Sandown Park - the Sandown Mile, the Gordon Richards Stakes and the Sandown Classic Trial. Plus, national hunt action from Perth. With analysis from Megan Nicholls and Jason Weaver, reports by Adele Mulrennan and Matt Chapman, and commentary from Richard Hoiles

programme.title: Sport Filler Shows (2020)
programme.desc: A look back at memorable stagings of the race from Epsom Downs. Featuring brilliant performances from Shergar to Sea The Stars, plus interviews with personalities from the worlds of sport and entertainment

programme.title: Minder
programme.desc: Bearer bonds go missing from gangster Bobby Altman, and suspect Billy Gilpin appears at Arthur's house wanting to get out of town. Terry drives him to a hotel, but when Altman finds out he believes Arthur is involved and tries to establish the truth. George Baker and Roy Kinnear guest star

programme.title: River Monsters
programme.desc: Extreme angler Jeremy Wade heads to Russia's remote Amur River, where the mysterious deaths of three men appear to be linked to a freshwater giant - a beast that can exceed 18ft in length and weigh more than a ton. However, he encounters a wall of silence and begins to suspect he has stumbled on to a dark secret that isn't supposed to be uncovered

programme.title: Giant Lobster Hunters
programme.desc: Skipper Squizzy is fatigued after working around the clock to fill a new 200kg order. Meanwhile, a major storm front closes over Tasmania, with the Bold Contender, the William Norling and the Barralee all at risk

programme.title: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire?
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson hosts the big-prize quiz in which another line-up of contestants answer questions that could change their lives - with the lifelines Ask the Audience, Phone a Friend, 50-50 and Ask the Host available to them if they get stuck

programme.title: The Chase Celebrity Special
programme.desc: Bradley Walsh presents as celebrity contestants Mikey North, Una Healy, Carl Froch and Alison Hammond pit their wits against ruthless quiz genius the Chaser in the hope of winning a potential prize pot worth thousands of pounds. They must work as a team and play strategically to answer general knowledge questions against the clock and race down the game board to the exit without being caught

programme.title: All Elite Wrestling: Dynamite
programme.desc: Hard-hitting action from the world of All Elite Wrestling - the roster features world-class talent including Jon Moxley, Chris Jericho, Bryan Danielson and Claudio Castagnoli, and many more who bring a freshness and energy into professional wrestling.

programme.title: All Elite Wrestling: All Access
programme.desc: Following the stars as they navigate the week-to-week challenges to remain at the top, and tracking the rivalries between talent as they vie for fans' attention

programme.title: River Monsters
programme.desc: Jeremy Wade visits Africa's Rift Valley on a quest to track down the Nile perch, a fish that can grow to a length of more than 8ft and weigh 500lbs. Facing dangers such as crocodile attacks, rival fishing gangs and hippos capable of mauling people to death, he embarks on possibly his most perilous mission yet

programme.title: River Monsters
programme.desc: Jeremy Wade heads for the South African river in which the biggest bull shark ever recorded was caught in 2009. He tries to find out whether there are more monster fish out there and if the presence of this known man-eater, which can tolerate fresh water, is a disaster waiting to happen

programme.title: The Professionals
programme.desc: CI5 is assigned to protect an Middle Eastern diplomat who is being pursued by assassins. With risky menu choices and a fellow diner's peculiar laughter taking the spotlight, will the conversations ranging from lookalikes to riding polar bears be enough to secure Shanice the prize?

programme.title: Come Dine with Me

programme.desc: The competition kicks off in rural Co Durham at Bowlees Farm Holiday Cottages, where married couple Tony and Viv Smith hope that their tranquil setting, private hot tubs and indoor swimming pool will leave their guests feeling as though they've died and gone to Durham. At first, their guests are bowled over by the views and the facilities but on closer inspection, friends Jane and Rachel find fault with the cleanliness in the kitchen. At dinner, it's revealed that breakfast will be provided by the local farm shop a mile down the road, the only facility that Tony and Viv don't seem to have. Despite the clean plates, married couple Amanda and Howard make their feelings clear on the lack of options. At feedback, the price tag of a fully equipped cottage proves to be too much to warrant a return visit for some

programme.title: Four in a Bed

programme.title: Four in a Bed

programme.title: Four in a Bed

An oil rig lifeboat owner tries to get his build shipshape and plush enough to convince his partner to move on board. Plus, George and contributor Will Hardie indulge in a slice of Africa in the Midlands, and Will visits an awe-inspiring Thomas Heatherwick building in Leeds that puts nature at its very heart

programme.title: Channel 4 News

programme.title: Hitler: The Lost Tapes
programme.desc: After the humiliation of the First World War, Hitler was determined to crush communism and create 'Lebensraum' (living space) for Germany. His ambition drove him to war in a bid for German global domination, but what he created ultimately led to his downfall and one of the greatest disasters the world has ever seen. The expansion of the Third Reich in the 1930s and the horrors of war were all captured on film

programme.title: Formula 1

Ferrari's Charles Leclerc qualified fastest here last year, with Sergio Perez of Red Bull joining him on the front of the grid, but it was Perez's teammate Max Verstappen who went on to win the race

programme.title: Le Mans '66 (2019)
programme.desc: Racing car driver and engineer Carroll Shelby is lured out of retirement during the 1960s, in a period where the sport is dominated by Italian companies. Ford Motors are hoping to revive their flagging fortunes by launching a racing division and securing a high-profile win at the prestigious Le Mans 24-hour race. Shelby takes up the challenge of headlining the plan to build a revolutionary new race car, but courts conflict within the company by recruiting unpredictable, short-tempered British driver Ken Miles to take the wheel. Fact-based drama, starring Matt Damon, Christian Bale, Jon Bernthal and Caitriona Balfe

Action sequel, starring Ice Cube, Samuel L Jackson and Willem Dafoe

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA

programme.desc: The Rothschild's giraffes are expecting a new addition as 12-year-old matriarch Dagmar, whose last calf died after a few days, goes into labour after a 15-month pregnancy. Orang-utan sisters Tuti and Siska, and their baby cousin Kesuma, rebuild their relationship after the trauma of the fire that engulfed their habitat in December 2018, while the keepers set off in pursuit when a blue-throated macaw goes on the run

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: Including sport and weather

programme.title: Formula 1

programme.title: The Great Celebrity Bake Off for Stand Up to Cancer
programme.desc: The charity version of the popular baking show returns, and with Noel Fielding on paternity leave, Matt Lucas is presenting on his own. In previous editions, comedian Tom Allen has stepped in to co-present - but today he is showing off his baking skills as one of the contestants, alongside Star Wars actress Daisy Ridley, comedian Rob Beckett and singer Alexandra Burke. To impress Paul Hollywood and Prue Leith, the celebrities serve up millionaire shortbread, a fruity tart and their pet hates in cake form in the showstopper

programme.title: The Windsors
programme.desc: One-off special of the sitcom, in which Charles prepares to finally ascend to the throne with all the pomp and ceremony he deserves. However, Wills tries to persuade him the ceremony should reflect the frugal times the nation is living through. Meanwhile in California, Harry and Meghan are finally free of Windsor family politics to concentrate on their simple life. But can they really afford to miss the crowning moment?

programme.title: Frankie Boyle's Farewell to the Monarchy
programme.desc: The comedian takes a look back at the darker side of the royal family's 1000-year history, and wonders how generations of land-grabbing, child-murdering, wife-beheading, slave-trading, misogyny, violence and empire-building have shaped our royal family today. Frankie looks back to the reigns of six key monarchs who not only had huge influence in their day, but still live long in our collective memory - and finds troubling connections between their grim past and the present

programme.title: Gogglebox

Comedy adventure, starring Brad Pitt, Angelina Jolie, Vince Vaughn and Adam Brody

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay heads to the coastal community of Long Beach, California, to save an Italian restaurant that was opened in 1958 and now under the misguided leadership of Nino, who blamed by brother Michael and sister Carina for the eatery's failings. Their 78-year-old mother Inge desperate for Nino to turn the business around, but the feuding family members will have to solve their differences first

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: On the first night in Peterborough, 39-year-old land surveyor and part-time musician Muneer hopes to win over his guests with a menu based on Pakistani recipes passed down through his family for generations. The authenticity extends beyond his food, with Muneer seating his guests on the floor of his specially dressed dining room. His guests include driving instructor Christine, hairdresser Ben, fiery Brazilian Rosie and fridge salesman Gregory. While his food receives mixed reviews, His guests discover his master plan for musical success, suffer bad jokes and find out that one of their fellow diners believes in mermaids

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: In Peterborough, driving instructor Christine hopes her vegetarian cuisine will grab her the £1,000 prize. But she's worried about being in the firing line, after Rosie compared Muneer's food to vomit on the first night. Now Moony's determined to give Rosie a public dressing down. However, with everyone dreading Christine's meat-free and bland-sounding menu, Rosie may not be the only one who has to bite her lip

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: In Peterborough, mobile hairdresser Ben plans a gourmet night. Most of his guests are looking forward to some meat after Christine's vegetarian feast the night before. programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Fridge salesman Gregory serves up a Spanish menu in Peterborough, accompanied by a charm offensive that he hopes will win him the £1,000 prize. Will it work or will the guests give him the cold shoulder?

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Fiery Brazilian Rosie is confident that her night will be the best of the week in Peterborough. programme.desc: A celebration of the much-loved holiday camp sitcom, featuring classic scenes and interviews with members of cast and crew including Su Pollard, Ruth Madoc, Jeffrey Holland, Paul Shane and Jimmy Perry. The programme reveals that Butlin's, the real-life inspiration for the series, were not impressed with the show, and there are backstage secrets, such as the day several cast members nearly drowned in the swimming pool

programme.title: Buckingham Palace: Upstairs, Downstairs
programme.desc: The royal family have always tried to project an immaculate image, but this documentary reveals what goes on behind closed doors. Stories from the household's staff include a cook revealing the Queen's surprisingly simple favourite treat and a footman of the Queen Mother recounting his most embarrassing gaffe, involving wine and Princess Margaret. Also, historian Kate Williams examines some of the most bizarre and shocking servant duties from ancient times

programme.title: Paul Burrell: Royal Service, Royal Scandal
programme.desc: The story of Princess Diana's former butler, charting his rise and the events of 2002, when he stood trial and was cleared of stealing items belonging to the Princess of Wales. Interviews with those who know Burrell best, including his brother and his ghost writer - as well as royal journalists and insiders - reveal how he went from footman to household name

programme.title: Charles & Camilla: Against All Odds
programme.desc: Documentary charting the relationship of the King and the Queen Consort, who have had a long and bumpy road to becoming monarchs. For Charles III, picking the right woman proved more than challenging, while winning public affection has been a job in itself for his wife over several decades, and the programme examines what have they learnt along the way and what type of sovereigns they will be

programme.title: Britain's Favourite 80s Songs
programme.desc: Gary Davies narrates this look at the music of 1980, featuring revealing interviews with the singers and band members who made it one of the biggest years in pop. From the Specials and the Jam to Blondie and Bowie, and not forgetting the biggest girl band of the time - the Nolans, it was a year of music and pop videos to remember. Sheena Easton was singing about her man working 9 to 5, Madness stormed the charts with Baggy Trousers and Dexy's Midnight Runners had a memorable number one with Geno. Contributors include Toyah Willcox, Paul Gambaccini and Katie Puckrik
